A stock represents ownership in a company. The value of a stock is determined by the company\u2019s earnings and growth potential.
The stock market is an institution through which people can buy and sell shares in companies. The New York Stock Exchange and the Nasdaq are two of the most well-known stock exchanges in the world.

Investing in stocks can be a great way to diversify your investment portfolio. It gives you exposure to a different asset class from bonds and cash.

But if you start early and invest for the long term, stocks can be a great way to grow your money.`),mdx("h2",null,"How to Start Investing in Stocks?"),mdx("p",null,`The first step towards investing in stocks is to build a solid financial foundation. There are times when the stock market goes through large swings in value.`),mdx("h2",null,"Should You Switch from Mutual Funds to Stocks?"),mdx("p",null,`Stocks are a great way to grow your money over the long term. There are several types of mutual funds. Whatever you do, don\u2019t buy stocks with money that you may need in the short term. You don\u2019t want to have to sell your stocks at a lower price because you need the money.
